text: Krodh () is a 2000 Indian action drama film directed and produced by Ashok Honda. It stars Sunil Shetty and Rambha in lead roles. The film is a remake of the 1996 Malayalam film Hitler, starring Mammootty and Shobhana. It was an average grosser at the box office. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2000s Hindi-language movies Category:2000 action movies Category:2000 drama movies Category:Hindi remakes of Malayalam movies Category:Indian movies
title: Krodh (movie)
